definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: When he was 15, and was working in a Church as an assistance organist, Ludwig was practically supporting the family.
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬15歲時就在教堂擔任助理風琴師，掙錢養家。

sentences.english: We've sort of gone from the Beach Boys to Beethoven here.
sentences.chinese: 我們好像從沙灘男孩一下跳到了貝多芬。

sentences.english: So how does Beethoven go about making the Ode to Joy joyful?What does he do here?
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬是怎樣讓歡樂頌變得那麼歡樂的呢？

sentences.english: But they did not have patience for this, nor him to read their lips.
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬對此沒有耐心，也不去看對方的口型。

sentences.english: Beethoven String Quartet, Op. 18, No. 2, final Movement.
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬絃樂四重奏，作品18號，第二首，末樂章。

sentences.english: Berlioz compared him favorably to Beethoven and Gluck.
sentences.chinese: 柏遼茲認爲他並不亞於貝多芬和格魯克。

sentences.english: In his youth he fell under the influence of Beethoven.
sentences.chinese: 他年輕時受到貝多芬的影響。

sentences.english: Beethoven Sonata for Piano and Violin No. 4,5,9
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬第4，5，9號鋼琴與小提琴奏鳴曲。

sentences.english: To the melody of Moonlight Sonata of Beethoven.
sentences.chinese: 到貝多芬《月光奏鳴曲》旋律暢想。

sentences.english: Journey back into Beethoven's mind with the Borromeo String Quartet.
sentences.chinese: 博羅美奧絃樂四重奏將會爲我們進行貝多芬解碼。

sentences.english: And Damisch chose Beethoven's A. N. S Appassionato Sonata for his a reason.
sentences.chinese: 達彌施選用了貝多芬的《熱情奏鳴曲》只有一個理由。

sentences.english: This movement is the most popular of Beethoven’s Symphony No. 7.
sentences.chinese: 這首樂章是貝多芬《第七號交響曲》中最受歡迎的。

sentences.english: Vicki had brought some Beethoven, which I put on the CD player.
sentences.chinese: 維姬隨身帶來貝多芬的唱片，我把它放進了CD機。

sentences.english: I am looking for a record of Beethovens Sixth Symphony.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找貝多芬第六交響曲的唱片。

sentences.english: They will perform Beethoven's Eroica at the concerto tonight.
sentences.chinese: 他們將在今晚的音樂會上演奏貝多芬的《英雄》。

sentences.english: In his youth he come under the influence of Beethoven.
sentences.chinese: 他年輕時受貝多芬的影響。

definition: Haydn (name)/Franz Joseph Haydn (1732-1809), Austrian classical composer
to compose a piece of music
